Class PersistedSessionManager<T extends Session>

  • Object

  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    SessionManager<T>

    public class PersistedSessionManager<T extends Session>
extends Object
implements SessionManager<T>
    Implementation of SessionManager that persists sessions.
